reviews.review:
I almost hated this movie. The action, humor, and characters are all fantastic. However, the ending ruined the movie. SPOILER ALERT!!! The movie ends with everybody disappearing and Thanos sitting on a throne watching the sun rise. The ending made me realize that the movie is a 2 hour advertisement for the MCU and a 4th Avengers movie. I can't wait for the HISHE about this movie. I hate the movie the more I think about this ending. If you give Disney your money for a ticket, leave before the ending. 

P.S. Chris Pratt is the reason the avengers lost.

Infinity War delivers the thrills of the first Avenger's movie and balances the action, humour and emotional elements to create a film that is thoroughly enjoyable from the start to the climax of this episode. Thanos exceeded my expectations.
It is a movie that may not manage all the heroes in the best way but still it a funny, nostalgic, sad and thrilling movie and it is everything we wanted and more.
Good movie, after over 2 1/2 hours it will still leave you wanting more.
Thought the fight scenes could have been better and the story line seemed rushed

This movie is awesome. It delivers in literally every way. The emotional gut punches are intense, the battle sequences are incredible, the character interactions are hilarious (especially between Tony, The Guardians, and Doctor Strange) and it sets up Avengers 4 to be one of the best endings to a story and one of the best films of all time. What an incredible culmination of a story 10 years in the making.
All I got to say is wow good MOVIE good good movie

Best Avengers movies to date. This deters a bit from the comics as Thanos is trying to kill half the universe to balance life itself instead of killing everyone to impress last Death. The humor was well placed and not forced like Star Wars Last Jedi. Many might be upset at the ending but it left me wanting more Marvel. Cant wait for 2019!

avengers inifnity war es una pelicula buena pero en algunas ocasiones el CGI , se notan muy creibles como por ejemplo los CGI de thanos las muertes son muy tristes y muy excelentes tambien los personajes son muy gloriosos y aplaudo a los hnos russo por su excelente trabajo en avengers

This movie was incredible.  I see a few featured professional critics who chose to diss this film and that gives a good idea of which critics' opinions marvel fans need never worry about.  I only hope they will release an extended edition on blue ray to allow more time with some of the characters.
